topic.title: Circuit Breaker Rating and Upstream Protection

body.p: The STS 2000A has input source and bypass MCCBs that are 100 percent rated for 2000A, the full load rating of the unit. Consequently the STS 2000A does not itself need upstream circuit breaker protection. However, customers should provide circuit breaker protection for the input wires to the STS as required by the NEC.
For additional information, refer to your local codes and the National Electric Code (NEC).
